description: A tool that runs Python code to help generate a response to a prompt.

container.description:
The code interpreter container. Can be a container ID or an object that
specifies uploaded file IDs to make available to your code.

anyOf.description:
Configuration for a code interpreter container. Optionally specify the IDs of
the files to run the code on.

file_ids.description: An optional list of uploaded files to make available to your code.

type.description: The type of the code interpreter tool. Always `code_interpreter`.
